**RPZ Events**

#### Description

This dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into DNS-based threat intelligence events using Infoblox Threat Defense RPZ (Response Policy Zone) data. It offers insights into key threat indicators such as events categorized by Policy Action, Threat Indicator, and Region, along with the most frequently triggered RPZ rules and contributing Threat Feed Sources.
Additionally, it highlights high-risk source IPs, policy enforcement trends, and event distribution over time.

**[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/infoblox_threat_defense/overview)**
